subject: Nutrition
title: Whole Foods Over Supplements
description: A quick win: understand Whole Foods Over Supplements.

hook.text: An apple contains over 10,000 phytochemicals. No supplement comes close to replicating that.

buildup.text: Whole foods deliver nutrients in a matrix of fiber, water, and compounds that work together.

discovery.text: Beta-carotene from carrots reduces cancer risk. Beta-carotene pills actually increased it in one trial.

twist.text: Isolating a single compound misses the synergy. Food nutrients interact in ways we don't fully understand.

climax.text: Supplements help specific deficiencies, but for most people, real food is the better investment.

punchline.text: The whole is greater than the supplement.

quiz.question: What happened with beta-carotene supplements in a cancer trial?
